Just 10 Minutes
From Employee to Entrepreneur
Step Into True Freedom.
No ceilings. No limits. A single deal could change your entire career path.
Hi Kyle,

Weâ€™re Devdive, a Pakistan-based software company with 8+ years of expertise in web solutions and AI-driven services. During our recent R&D for potential collaborators, your name stood out â€” and we believe you could be a very capable partner in helping us expand.


Weâ€™ve been looking for the right Business Developer, and this could be a perfect match. At DevDive, you earn 30% commission on every project you help us close â€” whether itâ€™s a $100 task or a $1,000,000 project. No caps, no limits.


Sometimes, just one opportunity, one connection, or one closed deal can be life-changing. This is your chance to create independence, financial freedom, and a future that grows as big as your ambition.

All we ask is 15 minutes of your time to explore how we can work together and build something remarkable.
Looking forward to connecting.
Best regards,
Bilal Shahid
Co-Founder & CTO
